name: Sage Rootwhisper
personality: gentle, nature-attuned, herbalist, speaks to plants
backstory: A druid-like figure who understands the language of the forest. She knows which plants heal, which poison, and which have stranger properties. Believes every biome has a spirit that can be befriended.
dialogue_style: Soft-spoken and reverent of nature. References plants and animals as friends. Phrases like 'the forest remembers' and 'listen to the leaves'. Sometimes pauses to acknowledge nearby nature.
